page.title: 16 How To Play "BLOCK"
page.content: {Block}is an easy{game}when you get used to it. The rules are these. One person is on the 'block'-this may be a wall or a lamp post. This person must close their eyes and count up to 500 in 5's. All the others go and hide. When the person on the block has finished counting, he searches for the others. The people who are hiding have to run or creep to the block and touch it. If the person who was counting sees them and runs and touches the block before them they are caught. The first person to be caught is on the block for the next{game.}If all the "Hiders" get to the block before the person who was counting then he is on the block again. The "Hiders" and the person on the block shout{"BLOCK 1-2-3 {"}when they touch the block.
